editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-xxx: Mystagogia, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡. HTexte 48–72; Textes 40–52; Me‘erāf I 215–7; MG 9ff. F-29r: Image of Michael, Mälk‘a Mika’el, መልክአ፡ ሚካኤል፡. Répertoire 119. Incipit : ሰላም፡ ለዝክረ፡ ስምከ፡ ምስለ: ስመ: ልዑል: ዘተሳተፈ:. MG 290ff. EMIP 16, ; EMIP 56, ; MYS 6, f–66v, 2066/Tweed 117, 2071/Tweed 122. F and 19r and 46v mention an owner ወልደ ጸድቅ. F-46v: Image of Saint George zä-Säläda Mogäs, መልክአ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ዘሰሌዳ፡ ሞገስ። incipit: ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምከ: ዘሰሌዳ: ሞገስ: መጽሐፉ: Répertoire 147. F-53r: Angels Praise Her, Yǝwedǝssǝwa Mäla’ǝkt, ይዌድስዋ፡ መላእክት፡ ለማርያም፡. Répertoire 388; MD 519ff. ; EMML 1593, . F-61v: Hymn to Mary, commonly called “Image of Edom,” መልክዐ፡ ኤዶም፡. Répertoire 221; MG 651ff. F-71v: Image of Gabriel, Mälk‘a Gäbra’el, መልክአ፡ ገብርኤል፡, incipit: ሰላመ: ገብርኤል: መልአክ: በላዕለ: ማርያም: ዘአዕረፈ:. Répertoire 246; MG 312ff. F-95r: Image of Jesus Christ, Mälk‘a Iyyäsus, መልክአ፡ ኢየሱስ፡. Répertoire 123. Incipit : ሰላም ለዝክረ ሰምኪ ስመ መሐላ ዘኢየኄሱ. Varia: F-47r: Magic Prayer based on Dersana Mika'el. : excerpt from Image of Jesus Christ, in another untrained hand.
